#general MoccaCalendar.calendar=Calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.title=Calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.defaultCalendarTitle=Other Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.viewall=Overview of all calendars MoccaCalendar.calendar.create=Create new calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist=agenda MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titlepast=Past Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titleupcoming=Upcoming Events MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.nopastevents=No past events found. MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.noupcomingevents=No upcoming events found. MoccaCalendar.calendar.firstDayOfWeek=0
MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.viewall=All events MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.create=Create new event MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.backlink=Back to calendar «{0}» MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.confirmDelete=Do you really want to delete the event {0}Â ? MoccaCalendar.calendarevent.view=Event MoccaCalendar.generic.errormessage=Internal Server Error
# Class fields MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_title=Title MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_color=Background color of entries in the calendar view MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_textColor=Text color of entries in the calendar view MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_description=Description MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass_content1=Content MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarClass.textColor.unset=(white)
# Live table generic keys moccacalendar.livetable.doc.title=Calendar moccacalendar.livetable.doc.name=Page name moccacalendar.livetable.doc.space=Space moccacalendar.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name moccacalendar.livetable.doc.author=Last Author moccacalendar.livetable.doc.creator=Creator moccacalendar.livetable.doc.date=Update date moccacalendar.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date moccacalendar.livetable._avatar=Avatar moccacalendar.livetable._images=Images moccacalendar.livetable._attachments=Attachments moccacalendar.livetable._actions=Actions moccacalendar.livetable._actions.edit=Edit moccacalendar.livetable._actions.delete=Delete moccacalendar.livetable.emptyvalue=- moccacalendar.livetable.title=Title moccacalendar.livetable.description=Description moccacalendar.livetable.content1=Content
moccacalendar.extension.name=Calendar Application (Pro)
# Mocca Calendar Events keys # Class fields MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_title=Title MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_startDate=Start date MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_endDate=End date MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_description=Description MoccaCalendar.MoccaCalendarEventClass_allDay=All day
# Event live table generic keys (currently unused) moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.title=Page title moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.name=Page name moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.space=Space moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.author=Last Author moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.creator=Creator moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.date=Update date moccacalendarevent.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date moccacalendarevent.livetable._avatar=Avatar moccacalendarevent.livetable._images=Images moccacalendarevent.livetable._attachments=Attachments moccacalendarevent.livetable._actions=Action moccacalendarevent.livetable._actions.edit=Edit moccacalendarevent.livetable._actions.delete=Delete moccacalendarevent.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys moccacalendarevent.livetable.title=Title moccacalendarevent.livetable.startDate=Start date moccacalendarevent.livetable.endDate=End date moccacalendarevent.livetable.description=Description
# validation messages val_title_notvalid=Title field contains invalid characters. val_title_notempty=Title field is required. val_startDateMissing=A start date is missing for the event. val_startDateNotDate=The given start date cannot be read as a date. val_endDateNotDate=The given end date cannot be read as a date. val_endDate=End date must be after start date. val_title_already_exists=An event with this name already exists.
# Template provider templateProvider.calendar.name=Calendar templateProvider.calendar.description=Add a new calendar
## Calendar macro rendering.macro.moccacalendar.name=Mocca Calendar rendering.macro.moccacalendar.description=Displays a Calendar rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.name=Show events from ... rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.description=Possible values are 'wiki','space' or 'page', where: 'page': only events which are children pages of this page will be included, 'space': only events which are in the space of the calendar doc will be included, 'wiki': all events will be included. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.name=Calendar page rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.description=The calendar document whose events are shown (only if filter is set to 'page'). This value is also used as the default calendar to create new events for. If missing, the current document is used. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.description=The initial way the calendar is displayed; can be changed by the user. Possible values are: 'month', 'agendaWeek', 'agendaDay' or 'plainList' rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First day of week rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Saturday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Sunday. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.name=First time rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8:00) rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Last time rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23:00) rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.name=Year rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.name=Month rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.name=Day rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today
xwiki.calendar.button.plainList=Agenda
